ValidationRule.description: Prevents Phone and Email information from being changed on the record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR( ISCHANGED(npe01__Preferred_Email__c), ISCHANGED(npe01__PreferredPhone__c), ISCHANGED(npe01__HomeEmail__c), ISCHANGED(npe01__WorkEmail__c), ISCHANGED(Assistant_Email__c), ISCHANGED(npe01__AlternateEmail__c), ISCHANGED(HomePhone), ISCHANGED(npe01__WorkPhone__c), ISCHANGED(MobilePhone), ISCHANGED(AssistantPhone), ISCHANGED(OtherPhone) ) && $Permission.Merge_Duplicates = FALSE && Is_Automation_Bypassed__c = FALSE, true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use related records to update Contact Phone/Email fields.
